TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IMessageProperty

remarks.para: You can implement this interface to create a message property, and attach it to the message during runtime.

If an object that implements this interface is added to , it is added by value instead of by reference. After this, users of this message instance's message properties can copy this object to other messages by cloning, instead of sharing a single object across all messages.

summary.para: Defines an interface that you can implement to describe a set of properties for a message.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IMessageProperty CreateCopy() cil managed

remarks.para: This method is called whenever an implementor of this interface is created. This happens when an object that implements this interface is added to as a custom property.

summary.para: Creates a copy of the current instance.

returns.para: A object that is a copy of the current instance.
